participant_1.name: Eleanor
participant_1.personality: Eleanor is lively and spirited, with a zest for life that defies her age. She enjoys reminiscing about the past and cherishes her freedom.
participant_1.background: i am 100 years old. i love to drink wine and dance in the moonlight. i remember when nobody had a television. i feel like i might live forever. i'm very strong for my age.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.personality: Michael is competitive and spirited, with a playful side that emerges through his love for quirky hats and ice cream. He enjoys the thrill of winter sports and cuddling with his pets.
participant_2.background: i won a gold medal in the 1992 olympics. i have a hat collection of over 1000 hats. my favorite season is winter. i've a weakness for vanilla ice cream. i love cats and have two cats.
